game.name: Blue Hawaii Aniki's Small Celebration vol.1
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Experience a fictional Japanese radio show as a visual novel. Two mismatched hosts — a self-proclaimed film director and an energetic DJ — celebrate life's small victories. Features original music, sound effects, and witty social commentary wrapped in comedy.
